I am statistician turned data scientist, now working at Rabobank. I am a true data junkie, I just love to play around with data. After doing bachelor programs in psychology and history I completed the Statistical Science program at Leiden University, at which I completed my MSc with professor Hein Putter. From the moment I started R programming I was hooked, and it always remained my weapon of choice. However I try to keep an open mind and keep exploring other tools as well. Besides data analysis

My current interests are building Bayesian statistical models, building beatiful and functional Shiny apps, understandig and applying Deep Learning and the prediction of (very) rare events. Furthermore I hope to further develop as programmer. If you like to correspond about any of these topics of other things mentioned in one of the blogs I would love to hear from you.

Besides a data junkie and R programmer I am also a bit of foodie, an enthuastic albeit not overly talented tennis player, a coffee and wine lover, a sports buff and an avid traveller.
